Name: MoonFall / Butterfly Lovers
About the game: 2021 Galgame popular works The story is based on Chinese legends Before the moon fell, Spending time with beautiful girl Kaori. Whether to live in a dreamlike utopia, Or face the harsh reality. Love, self, future, all in the world of Moonfall Operating Instructions: Mouse wheel to flip through the history Turn pages with the left mouse button Right mouse button to open the menu Left Ctrl hides the UI Right Ctrl Skips Special instructions If you encounter a case where the archive is stuck Please open the C:\Users\Name\AppData\LocalLow\XiheAnimation\MoonFall Delete the SaveData
